# Personal web page

Repository for my personal web page made in astro and deployed [here](https://alphatechnolog.is-a.dev)

> [!NOTE]
> Feel free to use this repository as a template for your own page. Contributions are also welcome!

![banner.png](./assets/banner.png)

## Getting started

```sh
git clone https://github.com/alphatechnolog/personal-web-page.git
cd personal-web-page
bun install
bun run dev
```
